name: The Lord's Recovery and How Religion Goes Wrong

episodes.title: LR136 - One Thing You Must Realize Which Will Make Leaving the LR Easier
episodes.description: This simple idea might make all the difference.

episodes.title: LR135 - Update, and Testimonies of Former LR Members
episodes.description: Update on the status of my channel, and information about a website with many testimonies of former LR members.

episodes.title: LR134 - Concealed Sexual Abuse in the LR Will Be Their Demise
episodes.description: Tolerating and concealing sexual abuse is a hallmark of abusive groups.

episodes.title: E129 - Put Fear in its Place
episodes.description: If you fear God, you don't have to fear anything else.

episodes.title: E128 - Why Can't the Lord's Recovery Figure Out Why it is Called a Cult?
episodes.description: It's not rocket science.

episodes.title: E127 - Video of a Lord's Recovery-like Group
episodes.description: Highlights from the Amazon Prime series "Shiny Happy People", which documents the IBLP movement, which closely resembles the Lord's Recovery movement.

episodes.title: E126 - Healthy Satire
episodes.description: Video showing my satirical articles about "the Lord's Recovery," with inspiring musical accompaniment.

episodes.title: E125 - Who Was Witness Lee?
episodes.description: Focusing on "the Lord's Recovery" founder Witness Lee himself. Where did he come from?  What were his successes and failures? What is his legacy?

episodes.title: E124 - Misusing Principles to Control People
episodes.description: The "Lord's Recovery" leaders tell followers to avoid two big errors, which, they explain, are (1) not listening to them and (2) leaving their group.

episodes.title: E123 - Don't Play Their Game
episodes.description: Why the "Lord's Recovery" is just another Christian organization, albeit one that abuses authority to control people and churches.

episodes.title: E122 - How the Lord's Recovery Organization Actually Stifles the Organic Church
episodes.description: Zeroing in on the essential error of the Lord's Recovery's attempted apostolic actions -- which is that they are acting organizationally, not organically.

episodes.title: E121 - Witnesses to the Resurrection, TLRU, and the Last Refuge of the Argument Loser
episodes.description: More discussion about the qualifications of apostleship, The Lord's Recovery Unchained's excellent video about oneness, and an example of how people who lose arguments resort to outrage.

episodes.title: E120 - Responding to a Listener's Questions About Apostles and Churches
episodes.description: Quick follow up on E119. Responding to an LR member's questions.

episodes.title: E119 - The Lord's Recovery's Errors About Apostleship and Church Autonomy
episodes.description: Reviewing shepherdingwords.com June 2023 articles, in which "the Lord's Recovery" makes several major errors concerning apostleship and church autonomy.

episodes.title: E118 - Every Church Has This Problem
episodes.description: Eventually the choice is: The mission or the organization?

episodes.title: E117 - They Still Don't Get It
episodes.description: Commenting on "the Lord's Recovery's" mistaken views on ministry, apostleship and their attitude toward 99% of the Body of Christ.

episodes.title: E116 - The LR's Errors Regarding Church Administration and Leadership
episodes.description: Comments on "The Lord's Recovery's" December, 2022 entries on shepherdingwords.com.

episodes.title: E115 - A Spoken History of the Lord's Recovery (1960-1997) - Natural-sounding voice version
episodes.description: A spoken version of Steve Isitt's "A History of the Lord's Recovery in the US."  This history reveals little known surreptitious events in the movement from 1960 to 1997. Witness Lee is the central character in this sordid history of an abusive Christian sect. New version of Episode 33, now with a natural-sounding narration voice.

episodes.title: E114 - Recommending "The Lord's Recovery Unchained"  Also... How to be Brainwashed
episodes.description:
I recommend the YouTube Channel The Lord's Recovery Unchained" 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE7-XS3oXN-ZfzclEazzYjw
and also show how to be brainwashed.

episodes.title: E113 - MOTA!
episodes.description: All my MOTA! cartoons in one place. Thanks again for listening!

episodes.title: E112 - Was Witness Lee Mentally Ill?
episodes.description: Discussing several points, including whether Witness Lee was mentally deranged.

episodes.title: E111 - The Intrinsic Problem, the Paradox of Oneness
episodes.description: Discussing how and why insisting on oneness is actually contrary to oneness.

episodes.title: E110 - The Intrinsic and Ironic Problem in the Lord's Recovery Today
episodes.description: Discussing that the Lord's Recovery's recurring problems are intrinsic to the flawed nature of the movement.

episodes.title: E109 - Why "The Lord's Recovery" is Doomed
episodes.description: Discussing how "the Lord's Recovery" exists in a purgatory of their own making.

episodes.title: E107 - The Fallacy of "the Feeling of the Body"
episodes.description: Examining how "the Lord's Recovery's" teaching of "the feeling of the Body" is actually contrary to what the Bible teaches about the Body of Christ.

episodes.title: E106 - What "the Lord's Recovery" Hates and Fears the Most
episodes.description: Discussing how "the Lord's Recovery" is most afraid of people who speak out, aka the prophets.

episodes.title: E104 - Desperation Looms in "The Lord's Recovery"
episodes.description: Discussing the latest desperate attempt by "Lord's Recovery" leaders to control the thinking and behavior of their members.

episodes.title: E103 - CULTISM: The Devil's Masterpiece
episodes.description: Examining how cultism is used in many ways, will be used to destroy the world, and how our experience with it has equipped us to recognize it.

episodes.title: E102 - A Short Personal History of "Recovery" Early Days and Decline
episodes.description: My experience of the early days of the LR and how and why it declined.

episodes.title: E101 - Discussing "Recovery" Lawsuits and Litigiousness
episodes.description: Looking at "the Lord's Recovery's" defense of their lawsuits and denial of being litigious.

episodes.title: E97 - Discussing the Ideas of Accountability and Covering
episodes.description: Looking into the teachings of accountability, covering and needing a shepherd, and seeing how they go wrong.

episodes.title: E95 - God Doesn't Want Everyone to be the Same
episodes.description: Examining how God made a wide variety of people, as reflected in the Myers-Briggs personality types, and how the "Lord's Recovery's" way of trying to make everyone the same is contrary to this.

episodes.title: E94 - How the "Lord's Recovery" Abuses the Truth of Life and Peace
episodes.description: Examining how the LR says having any misgivings or doubts about their movement causes a loss of "life and peace," and how to handle this deception.

episodes.title: E92 - The Sect of Oneness
episodes.description: Discussing how the "Lord's Recovery" publicly and in writing admits to being a sect, which they try to justify by being sectarian about "oneness."

episodes.title: E91 - Stewards... or Snobs.  You Can't Be Both.
episodes.description: Discussing the "Lord's Recovery's" sectarian policy of separating themselves from all other Christian churches and works, which is in essence spiritual snobbery.

episodes.title: E90 - Review of October 2020 shepherdingwords.com articles, Part 2
episodes.description: Part 2 of review of October 2020 Lord's Recovery articles on shepherdingwords.com.

episodes.title: E89 - Review of October 2020 shepherdingwords.com articles, Part 1
episodes.description: Part 1 of review of October 2020 Lord's Recovery articles on shepherdingwords.com.

episodes.title: E86 - What "The Recovery" Really Is - The "Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Discussing how the "Lord's Recovery" claims only the good things for itself, and blames all the bad things on others.

episodes.title: E85 - Am I Being Judgmental? - The "Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Addressing a judgmental listener's claims that I should not be judgmental.

episodes.title: E83 - Highlights of Interview with Cult Expert Steve Hassan - The "Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description:
Jordan Harbinger interviews cult expert Steve Hassan about controlling group practices. 

From "The Jordan Harbinger Show"  - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGLcx_fFZ3GlLXO5anHSm9w

episodes.title: E82 - Faith, Not Fear - The "Lord's Recovery" of Witness Nee
episodes.description: Victory means trusting God and not giving in to fear and worry.

episodes.title: E80 - Feel Free to Enjoy Your Soul - The  "Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Exposing the "Lord's Recovery's" draconian micro-managing of people's inner lives.

episodes.title: E79 - Responding to a "Lord's Recovery" Member - The "Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Responding to a long message from a "Lord's Recovery" member.

episodes.title: E78 - Ten Things "The Lord's Recovery" Should Do to Reform - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Ten Things "the Lord's Recovery" must do to have a future besides being a fringe, suspect group.

episodes.title: E75 - The Top 5 Things "the Lord's Recovery Got Wrong  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: My top five list of the worst of "the Lords' Recovery."

episodes.title: E74 - The Top 10 Things "the Lord's Recovery Got Right  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: My top ten list of the best of "the Lord's Recovery."

episodes.title: E71 - Looking at a DCP Publication  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Responding to a Defense and Confirmation Project publication which defends "the Lord's Recovery's" criticism of everyone but themselves.

episodes.title: E70 - The Appalling "Apostle" Effect  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: More examination into the bad fruit produced by claiming apostleship.

episodes.title: E69 - No, Witness Lee wasn't an Apostle - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Responding to the shepherdingwords.com article on apostles and co-workers.

episodes.title: E68 - Partial Inspiration, Temporal Discipline and Endless Self-Promotion - "The Lord's Recovery"
episodes.description: Seemingly everything "the Lord's Recovery" teaches is an opportunity for them to promote themselves.

episodes.title: E65 - Examining Lee's "God's Eternal Purpose and Economy" - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Taking a look at what's right and wrong about Witness Lee's view of God's purpose and economy.

episodes.title: E63 - Truly a Legacy of Shame  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Quotations from leaders of aberrant groups down through history show that "the Lord's Recovery's" claims of being the unique move of God are nothing new.

episodes.title: E61 - The Greatest Among Us  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Exposing the emptiness of "the Lord's Recovery's" claim of being "God's best."

episodes.title: E60 - More on Ron Kangas's Rant  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: More insight into the demagoguery of  "the Lord's Recovery"

episodes.title: E59 - Analyzing a Typical Ron Kangas Rant  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Exposing "the Lord's Recovery's" demagogic us-versus-them mentality.

episodes.title: E58 - Wrongheaded Views of Political and Social Activism - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Refuting "the Lord's Recovery's" backward claims that Christians should not be involved in political or social activism.

episodes.title: E57 - Ron Kangas, Demeaning Women and the Real Cause of Turmoils  - "The Lord's Recovery" of W. Lee
episodes.description: Examining the words of Ron Kangas, the demeaning of women and the real cause of so-called turmoils in "the Lord's Recovery."

episodes.title: E55 - Max, John and Other Abuses - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the half-truths and lies presented by "the Lord's Recovery" about how it handled Max Rapoport, John Ingalls and other abuses.

episodes.title: E54 - The One New Testament Ministry? - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining shepherdingwords.com's historical revisionistic claims about Witness Lee's "unique ministry of the age."

episodes.title: E52 - Covering Up, Not Covering, Part 2 - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Second part of examining "the Lord's Recovery's" misinterpretation and misuse of the biblical story of Noah's curse of Ham and Canaan.

episodes.title: E51 - Covering Up, Not Covering, Part 1 - "The Lord's Recovery"  of Witness Lee
episodes.description: First part of examining "the Lord's Recovery's" misinterpretation and misuse of the biblical story of Noah's curse of Ham and Canaan.

episodes.title: E47 - Women in God's Kingdom - The Original Intent  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: A look at God's original intent for men and women, and how the improvements in the world's culture just might be the work of God.

episodes.title: E45 - Looking at Minoru Chen's Messages to Sisters  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Some second thoughts on this sensitive subject.

episodes.title: E46 -  A Look at the Netflix Documentary "Cults Explained" - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description:
Commentary on the well-done Netflix "Cults, Explained' documentary. 

Link to documentary video: http://bit.ly/CultsExplained

episodes.title: E43 - The Linchpin of Control - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: More insight into the true nature of authority, and exposing some of the errors of "the Lord's Recovery's" view.

episodes.title: E42 - Another Indicting Comparison - "The Lord's Recovery" Movement of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Comparing "the Lord's Recovery" to Cult Research's (cultresearch.org - Janja Lalich) list of defining characteristics of a cult.  The results do not reflect well on "the Lord's Recovery."

episodes.title: E41 - If You Grew Up in  "The Lord's Recovery" - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the particular needs of people who grew up in controlling groups, that growing up in a controlling group is not that uncommon, and that a full life post-group is possible.

episodes.title: E40 - A Broader Perspective, Concluding Thoughts - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Wrapping up for now the investigation of "the Lord's Recovery" from a more general, sociological standpoint. Finishing up with a word of support and encouragement.

episodes.title: E39 - A Broader Perspective, Part 3 - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: More examination of "the Lord's Recovery" as a undo-influencing, controlling group, looking at how it lines up with Steve Hassan's "Influence Continuum."  The results do not reflect well on the LR.

episodes.title: E38 - A Broader Perspective, Part 2 - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: More looking at the controlling "Lord's Recovery" from a general view.  In this video I encourage self-trust and the right to scrutinize any subject. Also information on Steve Hassan's BITE model of mind controlling groups.

episodes.title: E37 - A Broader Perspective - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Pulling back to view the experience of "the Lord's Recovery" from a less religious, more general view, and proposing a fundamental principle for going forward.

episodes.title: E36 - The Basic Problem  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Showing that the basic problem of the Lord's Recovery is their valuing their "vision" more than people, and thereby making people means to the end of fulfilling that "vision," resulting in abuse.

episodes.title: E35 - Thoughts on Witness Lee's Trinity  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Considering Witness Lee's view of the Trinity, and proposing a better view.

episodes.title: E34 - The Significance of Lily Hsu's Book - "The Lord's Recovery" of W. Lee
episodes.description: Responding to shepherdingwords.com's weak accusations about Lily Hsu's book "My Unforgettable Memories," whose contents cast much doubt on the claims and legacies of Watchman Nee and Witness Lee.

episodes.title: E31 - Sheep, Wolf or Sheep Dog  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Summarizing and expanding on the subjects I've covered so far, and why I feel called to speak out.

episodes.title: E30 - The One Publication Edict  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the fact that the "the Lord's Recovery's" one publication edict proves it cannot be the "unique move of God."

episodes.title: E29 - The Daystar Debacle  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the unethical actions of the leaders of the "the Lord's Recovery" movement of Witness Lee in the Daystar money-making scheme.

episodes.title: E28 - Racism or Sexism in the LR?  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Looking at claims of racism and sexism in the "the Lord's Recovery" movement of Witness Lee

episodes.title: E27 - Witness Lee's Pasadena Rant  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Looking back at Witness Lee's bizarre rant in Pasadena in 1988, where he uplifted himself up in a most inappropriate way.

episodes.title: E25 - Responding to a Listener's Comments  - "The Lord's Recovery" of W. Lee
episodes.description: Responding to a listener's posted comments about "deputy authority."

episodes.title: E24 - Deputy Authority, Minister of the Age  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining "the Lord's Recovery's" website shepherdingwords.com and its specious claims about "deputy authority" and other matters.

episodes.title: E23 - Deputy Authority  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining "the Lord's Recovery's" website shepherdingwords.com and its specious claims about "deputy authority."

episodes.title: E21 - Exposing More Abuses of Oneness  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: More examination of how "the Lord's Recovery" hijacks the idea of oneness to control their members.

episodes.title: E20 - Exposing the Abuse of Oneness  - "The Lord's Recovery"  of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining how "the Lord's Recovery" hijacks the principle of unity for their own purposes, using it to control their members.

episodes.title: E19 - Making a  Mockery of Servant Leadership  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Servant leadership is how God protects his people from overbearing leaders.  "The Lord's Recovery" leaders run roughshod over and make a mockery of servant leadership.

episodes.title: E18 - The LR De-personalizes God and Relationships  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining how "the Lord's Recovery" de-personalizes God and relationships to make members emotionally dependent upon Witness Lee's ministry and the group's identity.

episodes.title: E17 - The Hypocrisy of "the Recovery"  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Belief in the principle of recovery should compel "the Lord's Recovery" to understand that people might have to leave the movement for recovery to occur.

episodes.title: E16 - The Sanctity of Autonomy  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: No person, group, church or ministry has the right to give you orders.  Your spiritual decisions are strictly between you and God.

episodes.title: E15 - God Gives Us All Things to Enjoy  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Exposing the extreme and imbalanced austerity of human behavior in "the Lord's Recovery" movement and recommending a healthier approach.

episodes.title: E11 - Is That Really How God Does Things?  - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Asking the question whether God would really do things the way the "Lord's Recovery" movement does them.

episodes.title: E10 - Exposing the Siege Mentality - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the radically closed-minded mentality of the Lord's Recovery.

episodes.title: E08 - The CRI Still Got it Wrong - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the Christian Research Institute's (CRI) flawed defense of the "The Lord's Recovery" Movement of Witness Lee.

episodes.title: E06  - The Fallacy of "the Minister of the Age" - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the fallacy of "the Minister of the Age" in "The Lord's Recovery" Movement of Witness Lee.

episodes.title: E04 - The Fallacy of "the Local Ground" - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the fallacy of "the local ground" in "The Lord's Recovery" Movement of Witness Lee.

episodes.title: E03 - The Abuse of Spiritual Authority - "The Lord's Recovery" Movement of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the abuse of spiritual authority in "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee.

episodes.title: E02 - The Fallacy of "The Recovery" - "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Examining the fallacy of the claims of Witness Lee's movement being "the Lord's Recovery."

episodes.title: E01 - Introduction to and Overview of "The Lord's Recovery" Movement of Witness Lee
episodes.description: Introduction to and Overview of "The Lord's Recovery" of Witness Nee, also known as The Local Church Movement.
